body.description: The JBL Go 2 is a full-featured waterproof Bluetooth speaker to take with you everywhere. Wirelessly stream music via Bluetooth for up to 5 hours of continuous JBL quality sound. Making a splash with its new IPX7 waterproof design, Go 2 gives music lovers the opportunity to bring their speaker poolside, or to the beach. Go 2 also offers crystal clear phone call experience with its built-in noise-cancelling speakerphone. Crafted in a compact design with 12 eye-catching colors to choose from, Go 2 instantly raises your style profile to all-new levels.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: JBL GO2 Bluetooth Speaker Grab and go. The JBL GO 2 is a full-featured waterproof Bluetooth speaker to take with you everywhere.
JBL GO2 BT Speaker Waterproof Design The IPX7 waterproof housing makes GO 2 perfect for listening by the beach or poolside, or even in it
JBL GO2 BT Speaker Wireless Bluetooth streaming Wirelessly stream high-quality sound from your smartphone or tablet.
JBL GO2 BT Speaker 5 hours of playtime Built-in, rechargeable Li-ion battery supports up to 5 hours of playtime.

Additional Features Includes Speakerphone Enjoy crystal clear conference calls over your speaker with the noise free speakerphone Audio Cable Input Don’t worry if Bluetooth is not available, plug an audio cable into the speaker and enjoy your music all the same

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact Powerhouse with Impressive Sound
reviews.reviewText: The JBL GO2 Waterproof Ultra Portable Bluetooth Speaker in Red has been a game-changer for me when it comes to portable music. With its compact size, impressive sound quality, and waterproof feature, this speaker has become my go-to companion for outdoor adventures.First and foremost, the battery life on this little powerhouse is outstanding. It offers up to 6 hours of continuous playtime, which is more than enough for a day at the beach or a hiking trip. I appreciate the convenience of not having to constantly recharge it.Considering its small size, the JBL GO2 delivers surprisingly rich and clear sound. The audio quality is excellent, with a good balance of bass and treble. Whether I'm enjoying my favorite tunes or using it for hands-free calls, the speaker never fails to impress. It easily fills a small room or outdoor space with immersive sound.One minor improvement I would suggest is the addition of a clip. While the compact design is great for portability, having a clip would make it even more versatile for attaching to bags or backpacks during outdoor activities. However, this is a minor drawback that doesn't overshadow the overall functionality and performance of the speaker.The waterproof feature is a huge plus, as it gives me peace of mind when using the speaker near water or in unpredictable weather conditions. It has held up well during beach trips, poolside gatherings, and even survived a few accidental splashes without any issues.The Bluetooth connectivity is seamless and hassle-free, allowing for easy pairing with my devices. The speaker also has a built-in microphone, which comes in handy for hands-free calling.In summary, the JBL GO2 Waterproof Ultra Portable Bluetooth Speaker in Red has exceeded my expectations in terms of its compact size, battery life, and sound quality. Its waterproof design adds an extra layer of durability, making it perfect for outdoor use. While a clip would be a nice addition, it doesn't detract from the overall excellence of this speaker. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a portable speaker that delivers impressive sound at an affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Powerful Companion for Every Adventure: JBL GO2 Portable Speaker
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the JBL GO2 Waterproof Ultra-Portable Bluetooth Speaker, and it has completely exceeded my expectations. As an avid music lover who enjoys outdoor activities, I needed a reliable and durable portable speaker that could keep up with my active lifestyle. The JBL GO2 has proven to be the perfect companion for all my adventures, providing exceptional sound quality, portability, and waterproof capabilities.First and foremost, I appreciate the reliability of JBL as a brand. They have established themselves as a trusted name in the audio industry, and the GO2 speaker lives up to their reputation. The build quality is impressive, and it feels sturdy and well-made. I have confidence that this speaker will withstand the test of time and any accidental bumps or drops.The sound performance of the JBL GO2 is outstanding. Despite its compact size, the speaker delivers surprisingly powerful audio with clear highs and impressive bass. I was pleasantly surprised by the volume this little speaker can produce. Whether I'm by the pool, riding my jet ski, or even taking a shower, the JBL GO2 fills the surroundings with rich and vibrant sound. It truly brings my music to life, creating a captivating and immersive listening experience.Portability is another major advantage of the JBL GO2. Its small size allows me to effortlessly carry it in my bag or pocket, making it incredibly convenient for on-the-go use. I can take it anywhere, from outdoor adventures to social gatherings with friends. Despite its compact dimensions, the speaker has a solid battery life, allowing me to enjoy uninterrupted music for hours on end.The waterproof feature of the JBL GO2 is a game-changer. Being able to bring the speaker to the poolside or even into the shower without worrying about water damage is fantastic. It adds a new level of versatility and peace of mind, ensuring that I can enjoy my music wherever I am, regardless of the weather or environment.Overall, I highly recommend the JBL GO2 Waterproof Ultra-Portable Bluetooth Speaker to anyone in need of a reliable, compact, and water-resistant speaker. It offers exceptional sound quality, convenient portability, and a durable design. JBL has once again delivered a fantastic product that lives up to their reputation. With the JBL GO2, your favorite music will always accompany you on your adventures, adding an extra layer of joy and entertainment to every moment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these speakers
reviews.reviewText: 2nd time I have bought one of these. I wanted to give this one as a gift since I love mine so much! Great sound, long battery life, easy connection, lightweight. Works well around water. HIghly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No instructions but worth the price
reviews.reviewText: This product is great. The only thing I didnt like was that it didnt come with instructions so I had to watch a youtube video to find out how to pair it to my phone. Other than that the sound is great and its perfect for someone who moves alot.

The JBL GO2 Ultra Portable Waterproof speaker is a fantastic little device that packs a punch in terms of sound quality and portability. As someone who loves to listen to music on the go, this speaker has become an essential part of my daily routine.First and foremost, the sound quality of the JBL GO2 is impressive for its size. The speaker delivers clear and crisp audio, with surprisingly good bass for its compact design. Whether I'm listening to my favorite tunes or watching a movie, the sound is always immersive and enjoyable.One of the standout features of this speaker is its portability. The JBL GO2 is incredibly small and lightweight, making it easy to carry around in a bag or even in your pocket. I love taking it with me on hikes, picnics, or even just around the house. The built-in strap also adds convenience, allowing me to hang it up wherever I go.Another great aspect of the JBL GO2 is its waterproof design. I no longer have to worry about accidental spills or rain ruining my speaker. It has survived a few accidental splashes and continues to work perfectly fine. This feature gives me peace of mind, especially when using it outdoors or near water.The battery life of the JBL GO2 is also impressive. It can last up to 5 hours on a single charge, which is more than enough for my needs. I appreciate that it charges quickly as well, so I don't have to wait too long before using it again.The only minor downside I have noticed is that the speaker's volume could be slightly louder. While it is sufficient for personal use or small gatherings, it may not be ideal for larger parties or outdoor events. However, this is a minor issue considering the overall performance and convenience of the JBL GO2.In conclusion, the JBL GO2 Ultra Portable Waterproof speaker is a fantastic investment for anyone looking for a compact and reliable speaker. Its impressive sound quality, portability, and waterproof design make it a versatile companion for any occasion. I highly recommend it to music lovers and outdoor enthusiasts alike.
Muito bom, ideal para sonorização interna.

Es pequeña pero potente...la volví a comprar porque me sirve mucho, tiene gran sonido y la bateria si dura varias horas. Bocina muy recomendable si buscas algo pequeño, portátil y que reproducza bien el sonido.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This speaker isn't very loud at all. Compared to speakers half it's price it is extremely quiet and the quality of the sound is no better. So not worth the money at all

Small but mighty! I have always loved the JBL brand and had huge speakers in the past, but was excited when I came across this mini speaker with huge sound for everyday use. It gives big sound for such a small device. When you think it is probably max volume it keeps going...Even the bass sounds quite good. An added bonus is the fact it is waterproof which is a good feature for pool or beach/lakeside use. This gift was a hit with my husband over Christmas. Size definitely does not matter here and this nice mini speaker is a solid purchase!
